mapper.insert: insert into snack (snack_name, company, snack_img, snack_ingredients, snack_reportNo) values (#{snack_name}, #{company}, #{snack_img}, #{snack_ingredients}, #{snack_reportNo});

insert into snack_nutritional (snack_id, netwt, nutri_string, allergy, protein, kcal, fat, carb, sugars, calcium, sodium, cholesterol, saturated_fat, trans_fat) values (#{snack_id}, #{netwt}, #{nutri_string}, #{allergy}, #{protein}, #{kcal}, #{fat}, #{carb}, #{sugars}, #{calcium}, #{sodium}, #{cholesterol}, #{saturated_fat}, #{trans_fat});
mapper.select: select a.snack_name, a.company, a.snack_img, a.snack_ingredients, a.snack_reportNo, b.netwt, b.nutri_string, b.allergy, b.protein, b.kcal, b.fat, b.carb, b.sugars, b.calcium, b.sodium, b.cholesterol, b.saturated_fat, b.trans_fat from snack a join snack_nutritional b on a.snack_id = b.snack_id where a.snack_reportNO = #{snack_reportNo}
mapper.update: update snack a join snack_nutritional b on a.snack_id = b.snack_id set a.snack_ingredients = #{snack_ingredients}, a.snack_name = #{snack_name}, a.snack_img = #{snack_img}, a.company = #{company}, b.netwt = #{netwt}, b.nutri_string = #{nutri_string}, b.allergy = #{allergy}, b.protein = #{protein}, b.kcal = #{kcal}, b.fat = #{fat}, b.carb = #{carb}, b.sugars = #{sugars}, b.calcium = #{calcium}, b.sodium = #{sodium}, b.cholesterol = #{cholesterol}, b.saturated_fat = #{saturated_fat}, b.trans_fat = #{trans_fat} where a.snack_reportNo = #{snack_reportNo}
